str2: From eu and lambano; taking well, i.e. Circumspect.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From sun and komizo; to convey together, i.e. Collect or bear away in company with others.
The same as stephanos; Stephanus, a Christian.
Beating of the breast or head in lamentation, lamentation. From kopto; mourning.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
